title: Mediterranean Pasta
description: Indulge in the symphony of the sea with our Mediterranean Pasta, a delectable blend of fresh, succulent seafood and aromatic spices, twirled in perfectly cooked spaghetti. A true chef's specialty, brimming with the treasures of the ocean.

title: Pasta du Chef
description: Experience the essence of the ocean with our Pasta du Chef, a harmonious mix of the finest seafood and exotic spices. Each bite is a culinary journey, rich in flavor and crafted with care. Please note: This dish celebrates the bounty of the sea, including shrimp.

title: Chilli Pasta
description: Ignite your taste buds with our Chilli Pasta, a daring fusion of fettuccine and fiery chilli sauce. Infused with a selection of hand-picked spices, this dish promises a thrilling adventure in every forkful.

title: House Salad with Grilled Salmon
description: Savor the freshness of our House Salad, a vibrant medley of crisp lettuce, peppery arugula, and sweet carrots, topped with exquisitely grilled salmon. A dish that's as nourishing as it is delicious.

title: Steak with Potatoes
description: Feast on our classic Steak with Potatoes, featuring a succulent, grilled-to-perfection beef steak alongside golden, crispy french fries. Complemented with fluffy rice and a selection of delectable sauces, this meal is a hearty delight.

title: Diced Picanha with Vegetables and Pasta
description: Indulge in our Diced Picanha, a generous serving of richly flavored beef, paired with grilled, garden-fresh vegetables and your choice of pasta. This dish is a testament to our commitment to quality and taste.

title: Vegan Lasagna
description: Dive into our Vegan Lasagna, a 100% plant-based masterpiece made with savory soy meat and layers of specialty pasta. Each slice is a testament to how delicious vegan cuisine can be.

title: Special Salad
description: Discover the joy of our Special Salad, a vibrant and healthful blend of creamy avocado, sweet mango, crisp lettuce, and nutritious chickpeas. A salad that's not just a dish, but a celebration of flavor and wellness.

title: Meatballs
description: Relish our Meatballs, tender and flavorful, bathed in a rich sour cream sauce with a hint of onion and spices. Served with your choice of rice or pasta, this dish is comfort food at its finest.
